name: 2023 the 6th International Conference on Mechatronics, Robotics and Automation
content: Publicationï¼š After several peer review processes, all full papers accepted by ICMRA 2023 will be published into ICMRA 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services.
